title: How to Make Vegetarian Green Curry Paste

steps.headline: Fry the coriander seeds and cumin seeds without oil until they start to brown.
Put all remaining ingredients into a medium sized bowl.
Mix together well until blended into a paste.
Use immediately or store, covered, in a refrigerator for up to 1 week.

text: Assemble ingredients.  Fry the coriander seeds and cumin seeds without oil until they start to brown.  Grind them into a spice.  Put all remaining ingredients into a medium sized bowl.  Add ground spices.  Mix together well until blended into a paste.  Use immediately or store, covered, in a refrigerator for up to 1 week.
